name: rjweb-server
description: Easy and Robust Way to create a Web Server with Many Easy-to-use Features in NodeJS

scripts.build: rm -rf lib && tsc && rm -rf lib/typings/tests && mv lib/typings/src/* lib/typings && rm -rf lib/typings/src && rjbuild build src --format='cjs' --out='lib/cjs' && rjbuild build src --format='esm' --out='lib/esm' && cp package.json lib/cjs/pckg.json && cp package.json lib/esm/pckg.json
scripts.docs: rm -rf docs && typedoc --out docs src/index.ts && sed -i -e 's|<meta charSet="utf-8"/>|<meta charSet="utf-8"/><link rel="icon" type="image/png" href="https://img.rjansen.de/rjweb/icon.png">|' docs/index.html && chmod -R a+rw docs

author: 0x4096 (Robert Jansen)
